title: The best way to get your point across to riot is with your wallet.
body:
If you don't like the paywalled missions, don't buy them and encourage others to not buy them. 
If you don't like the SG skins, don't buy them and encourage others to not buy them. 
The best way to get straight to a company is to make them start losing money. If you complain about something but still support it with your $, to the company that still seems like a win. 

If you don't like something, don't buy it.
